definition: the act of moving hurriedly and in a careless manner, urge to an unnatural speed
details:
noun
- the act of moving hurriedly and in a careless manner
= synonyms: haste
- overly eager speed (and possible carelessness)
= synonyms: haste
- a condition of urgency making it necessary to hurry
= example: a condition of urgency making it necessary to hurry
= synonyms: haste
verb
- urge to an unnatural speed
= synonyms: rush
- act or move at high speed
= synonyms: rush, hasten, look sharp, festinate
- move very fast
= synonyms: speed
